tool_description: This API provides live share prices for stocks in world-wide exchanges on every minute basis. Supports 61 stock exchanges and more than 50,000 stocks world-wide.
name: Live Share Price for Stocks
title: Live Share Price for Stocks

api_list.name: IntradayLivePrice
SupportedExchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-share-price-for-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/SupportedExchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-share-price-for-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
